mapper.select: select id, url, description from permission where description LIKE "%"#{description}"%"
SELECT per.id, per.url, per.description FROM `permission` AS per LEFT JOIN role_permission AS rp ON per.id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN role_info AS ri ON ri.id = rp.role_id WHERE ri.id = #{roleId}

SELECT per.id, per.url, per.description FROM permission AS per LEFT JOIN role_permission AS rp ON per.id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN role_info AS ri ON rp.role_id = ri.id LEFT JOIN user_role AS ur ON ri.id = ur.role_info_id LEFT JOIN user_info AS ui ON ur.user_info_id = ui.id WHERE ui.id = #{userInfoId}
